references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: J. L. Davison, Jeffrey Shallit, Continued Fractions for Some Alternating Series, Monatsh. Math., 111 (1991), 119-126.
maple: A007704 := proc(n) options remember; if n <= 2 then RETURN(n+1) else (A007704(n-2)-1)*A007704(n-1)+1; fi; end;
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Jeffrey Shallit_
